ing: 3 tart apples - peeled, cored and julienned
des: "This is both a old and unusual apple salad.  It is a pickled salad made with tart apples, onions, and dill pickles, and is very good served as an accompaniment to pork."
ins:
In a small bowl, combine sugar and vinegar.
In a medium bowl, mix together apples, onion, and pickle.  Toss with vinegar mixture.  Refrigerate until thoroughly chilled.
